bookmark.title: Bookmark
bookmark.too-many: Be our Premium user to have more than {{number}} vocabularies in the list

read-all.premium-required-description: Be our Premium user to enjoy more features

search.title: Search
search.description: You can find any word across all lessons.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.help-translation-description: We've opened the translation process up to the community because you know best how the APP should be translated into your language. Please participate as much as you like in translating, voting, and discussion.
feedback.tts-instruction-description: Please make sure you have enable "Text to speech" feature and install a Japanese language pack. We recommend using Google text to speech engine.

about.title: About
about.purchase-title: You are our premium user now
about.restore-failed-title: You have never purchased our Premium before

adfree.title: Remove Ads
adfree.description: - Remove all popup and banner ads

premium.title: Get Premium
premium.note-description: By tapping "Continue", your payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your subscription will automatically renew for the same package length at the same price until you cancel it in the settings in the iTumes store at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. By tapping "Continue", you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms.

premium-banner.adfree-description: No more ad banners and topup ads
premium-banner.listening-description: Listen to the pronunciation and choose the correct answer, answers can be shown in Kanji, Romaji or your language
premium-banner.quiz-description: Test your fluidity in translating Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji or Romaji to one and another
premium-banner.read-all-description: Pronounce every word in the lesson and followed by its meaning
premium-banner.read-all-description-android: Pronounce every word in the lesson and followed by its meaning (please make sure TTS works on your device before purchasing)

common.tts-required: Google Text-to-Speech is required for using this app
common.coming-soon-description: Please stay tuned we will bring more and more features

rating.title: Enjoy our APP?
rating.title-description: Please give us 5 stars to cheer we up if you like this app.
rating.feedback-description: Don't like our APP? Give us some feedbacks. We will definitely keep improving.
